thread.title: Trinity World University of UK Confers PhD Degree & Gold Medal to Dr. Nagji K. Rita
thread.title_full: Trinity World University of UK Confers PhD Degree & Gold Medal to Dr. Nagji K. Rita

title: Trinity World University of UK Confers PhD Degree & Gold Medal to Dr. Nagji K. Rita
text:
Company : Dr. Nagji K. Rita Thursday, July 9, 2015 4:23PM IST (10:53AM GMT) Trinity World University of UK Confers PhD Degree & Gold Medal to Dr. Nagji K. Rita Mumbai, Maharashtra, India 
Trinity World University of United Kingdom (UK) has awarded PhD degree of Hon. Doctor of Philosophy and Gold Medal to Dr. Nagji K. Rita for Corporate Services and Social Work. The degree was presented at Kolkata, which is the Asian Headquarter of Trinity World University ,on 1 st July 2015. The degree was presented at the hands of Prof. Dr. Suresh Prasad Singh, Former Vice Chancellor of VKS University. Dr. Nagji K. Rita has served as a Director of Governing Board of Bombay Stock Exchange. He is the Chairman of Inventure Growth & Securities Ltd., which is a listed company. He is also Chairman of Fortune Group. He is the Chairman of Vagad Gurukul. He is a Director of West Suburban Grocers Co-operative Society. He is a Trustee of Sanskar Sarjan Education Trust. He is a former Hon. Secretary of Kutch Corporate Forum. His business empire includes Inventure Growth & Securities Ltd., Inventure Sejal Realtors, Ratnasagar Diamond Mall, Fortune Money Control, Five Fortune Group, Shah & Rita Builders & Developers, Rikki Ronie Developers , Fortune Properties etc.
